DOC.brief_summary: Demonstrate ability muti-detector compute tomography adequately perform stress test result veritable `` one-stop shop '' non-invasive cardiac imaging , ability directly visualize heart artery high accuracy simultaniously determine hemodynamic significance blockage visualize .
DOC.brief_title: Myocardial Perfusion Assessment With Multidetector Computed Tomography
DOC.criteria: Adults > 18 year age Adults undergoing myocardial perfusion SPECT imaging Adults suspect coronary artery disease Age < 18 Known suspect renal insufficiency ( Creatinine < 1.7 mg/dl ) Allergy contrast Inability contraindication lexiscan beta blocker
